question_text: Select two features typically associated with metered pricing in cloud services.
answer_options: Charges are based on actual usage
Costs are the same each month
Users are billed per unit of data transferred or stored
Resources are billed in fixed resource blocks
correct_answer: Charges are based on actual usage
Users are billed per unit of data transferred or stored
explanation: Metered pricing means you are charged by the byte, GB, or similar unit. This includes bandwidth and storage.
